com.qualcomm.robotcore.util

Class RunShellCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qualcomm.robotcore.util.RunShellCommand

  • public class RunShellCommand
extends java.lang.Object
    Run shell commands

    Light weight utility class for running shell commands.

                                      RunShellCommand shell)

        Parameters:

      • getSpawnedProcessPid

        public static int getSpawnedProcessPid(java.lang.String processName,
                                       java.lang.String packageName,
                                       RunShellCommand shell)
        return the PID of a given process name started a given package name
        Parameters:
        processName - name of process to search for
        packageName - name of this package
        shell - an instance of RunShellCommand
        Returns:
        PID, or -1 if none found
